column2: What type of cannabis advertising have you been exposed to in the past 30 days? Please check all that apply.

column1: Digitally on a cell phone, tablet, or computer (through email, text messages, websites, or social media)
At an event, like a concert, fair, rodeo, parade, or similar
On street side marketing, like sandwich boards
On signs being held by people on sidewalks (sign wavers)
